projects.name: Plan Ahead App
projects.description: An ordering portal built for a former employer to coordinate store needs with DSPs. Features include store/admin login, item selection, checkout, and an email receipt system using Resend.com API. UI developed with Next.js for a responsive and intuitive experience.

projects.name: M.A.J General Maintenance Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page for M.A.J General Maintenance LLC, including hero, services, testimonials, and contact sections. Integrated an emailing API that sends messages to the owner when a visitor submits the contact form.

projects.name: ToDo App
projects.description: Created a nice UI todo app which lets you add and remove tasks
